entry.title: Performance dashboard of open-ended funds in Vietnam

link.title: Performance dashboard of open-ended funds in Vietnam

entry.summary: (Tiếng Việt bên dưới) I started working on this chart as a simple line chart, just to introduce myself to D3.js. Since then I’ve kept thinking of new features and the code has growth much larger than just a small “Hello World”. Inspired by Highcharts’s stock chart. Disclaimer: I have no affiliation with any of these asset management companies. The information contained in this ...
